body_html:
Lite unfortunately currently doesn't support Sub. We are planning to add support to it soon.
If you could share the python source of your model, we might be able to point out an alternative approach. You could possibly simulate a subtraction by doing a 1x1 conv with same padding with the filter -1 and then do an addition... i.e.

foo - bar
is equivalent to
foo + bar* -1
body_text:
Lite unfortunately currently doesn't support Sub. We are planning to add support to it soon.
If you could share the python source of your model, we might be able to point out an alternative approach. You could possibly simulate a subtraction by doing a 1x1 conv with same padding with the filter -1 and then do an addition... i.e.
foo - bar 
is equivalent to
foo + bar* -1
body:
Lite unfortunately currently doesn't support Sub. We are planning to add support to it soon.
If you could share the python source of your model, we might be able to point out an alternative approach. You could possibly simulate a subtraction by doing a 1x1 conv with same padding with the filter -1 and then do an addition... i.e.

`foo - bar `
is equivalent to 
`foo + bar* -1`
